unicorns.name: High-Growth Unicorn Companies

fitAnalysis.message: Your skill set aligns well with high-growth company needs

whyFeasible: Unicorns value pragmatic engineers who ship fast
Your project experience matters more than purely academic system design
You can grow with the company and learn at scale
whatYouNeed: Ability to make quick technical decisions with incomplete information
Experience building features end-to-end, not just designing
Strong ownership mentality and willingness to wear multiple hats

rounds.name: Technical Assessment - Problem Solving
points: Focus on implementation over pure theory
Show ability to handle real-world constraints

rounds.name: System Design - Pragmatic Approach
points: Design for current scale with future growth in mind
Discuss tradeoffs between perfection and shipping
Show understanding of when to build vs buy

rounds.name: Team Fit - Ownership & Collaboration
points: Discuss projects where you took ownership
Show how you handle ambiguity and incomplete specs
